content: materials 2 skeins of purl soho s cotton pure 1 100% organically grown cotton each skein is 279 yards/ 100 grams - main color mc 1 skein approximately 279 yards required we used pink sand - contrast color cc 1 skein approximately 279 yards required we used egret white you ll also need - us 4 3 5mm 40-inch circular needles 2 - us 6 4mm 40-inch circular needles gauge 16 stitches = 4 inches in stitch pattern on smaller needles size finished dimensions 10½ inches wide by 57½ inches in circumference 1 //www purlsoho com/yarn/knitting-crochet/cotton-pure html 2 //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html type_filter=881
